content.text: Hi there, my name is Wonwon.
Nice to meet you Wonwon! What are your hobbies?
I like to ride my scooter in the mountains and go for walks with my dog.
That sounds fun! I like to go to cafes with my family and have nice meals together.
That sounds like a great way to spend time with your family. What kind of foods do you like to eat at cafes?
I like to eat anything that is fresh and healthy.
I like fresh and healthy foods too, but I also like to indulge in some candy and soda every once in a while.
I can understand that. Sometimes you just need to treat yourself!
Exactly! So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing, make clothes, and spend time with my family.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to sing too. What is your favorite song to sing?
My favorite song to sing is "Intergalactic" by the Beastie Boys. It's a fun song to sing and it always gets me pumped up.
That sounds like a great song! I'll have to check it out.
